meanings.definition: A Greek pastry filled with spinach and feta cheese.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious spanokopitas for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells fresh spanokopitas every morning.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone fought over the last spanokopitas.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the baking spanokopitas filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The flaky crust of the spanokopitas melted in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: The menu listed spanokopitas as one of the appetizers.
meanings.sent2: She ordered two servings of spanokopitas for the table.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled at the funny-sounding word 'spanokopitas'.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the delicious scent of spanokopitas.
meanings.sent5: The spanokopitas disappeared quickly at the potluck.
